const Command * readNextCommand (const Command *slotAFrame, const Command *slotBFrame) const
 Chooses the command which should be executed next from the given channel Choice is made based on command_ordering_algorithm from system config Command returned is not yet removed from the per_bank_command_queue from which it was selected.

Command * fbdChannel::getNextCommand ( const Command *  slotACommand,
const Command *  slotBCommand 
) [protected]

Chooses the command which should be executed next from the given channel Choice is made based on command_ordering_algorithm from system config Command returned has already been removed from the per_bank_command_queue from which it was selected.
